docs.title: Conclusion
docs.text: For any assistance or inquiries: Phone Support: Call +8379281.（available on weekdays）

docs.title: Step 1: Start the Copying Process
docs.text: • Tap the "Self-Service Copy" icon on the Touch Screen to begin.

docs.title: Step 2: Authenticate with Your Campus Card
docs.text: • Swipe your campus card over the sensor area below the screen for authentication.

docs.title: Step 3: Prepare Your Document for Scanning
docs.text: • Open the printer lid and place the original document face down on the glass plate, and ensure that the document aligns with the scale indicators.

docs.title: Step 4: Set Copying Parameters
docs.text: • Tap the "Copy" icon on the copier screen to begin, and configure the copying settings

docs.title: Step 5: Start the Copying Process
docs.text: • Press the "Start" button on the screen to begin copying.

docs.title: Step 6: Collect Your Documents
docs.text: • After copying, remember to take your original documents and copies.

docs.title: Step 7: End copying process Swipe card and pay fees.
Equipment Overview
docs.text:
• Computer: mainly used to upload files
  • Touch Screen: mainly used to select service type and swipe card payment
  • Printer: mainly used for printing and copying

docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: In order to provide a more simple and convenient series of services such as self-service printing and copying, the Southeast University Library and Hangzhou Unifound Information Technology Company have founded a library self-service system. Now officially launched, welcome to use!

docs.title: Location
docs.text: On the Jiulonghu campus, self-service printing services are located in the center on the second floor of the library. On the Sipailou campus, the print center is located in Room 100 on the first floor of the library. On the Dingjiaqiao campus, the Print Center is located in Room 303 on the third floor of the library.

docs.title: Step 1: Transfer Files
docs.text: • Log in to WeChat and upload the files to be printed through WeChat.

docs.title: Step 2:Save and Open the File
docs.text: • Log in to WeChat and upload the files to be printed through WeChat.

docs.title: Step 3: Select print options and Set print requirements
docs.text: • Select the printing option in word, log in to "Lianchuang Printing Management System", input campus card number and password, and then set the printing requirements

docs.title: Step 4: Swipe the Card and Start Printing
docs.text:
• Select ‘Self-Service Printing’ on the stage, swipe the card in the sensing area and start printing
  • Step 5: Take away the File and Finish Printing

Tip

  • The download time will be longer when printing PDF files or other large files. Please be patient!
  • Upload and print PDF files in sections, please no more than 100 pages!

docs.title: Common Problems and Solutions
docs.text:
6.1. Deducting fees without producing paper
  • Check whether the printer is short of paper.
  • Confirm that the correct paper size has been selected.
6.2. File upload failed "
  • Check whether the file format is supported, if not, please convert to a supported format.
  • Check if the file size exceeds the printer limit, if more than, please try to upload or compress.
6.3. Lack of ink

*Replace a new ink cartridge or toner cartridge in time. *Make sure the cartridge model is correct when replacing the cartridge

6.4. Paper jam

*Follow the prompts on the printer screen when a paper jam occurs

docs.title: 7.1. Protect personal privacy
docs.text:
• Make sure that the printed documents are taken away in time after the printing.
  • Remember to exit WeChat after printing.

docs.title: 7.2. Compliance with the regulations of use
docs.text: • Abide by copyright laws and do not print infringing documents or pirated materials.

docs.title: 7.3. Pay attention to equipment maintenance
docs.text: • Before use, please check whether the printer is working normally. If there is any abnormal situation, please report to repair in time.

docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs
docs.text: For full documentation visit mkdocs.org.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: 总结
docs.text: 如需任何帮助和咨询: 电话号码: Call +8379281.（工作日提供服务）

docs.title: 步骤 1: 开始复印流程
docs.text: • 轻触触摸屏上的“自助复印”图标以开始。

docs.title: 步骤 2: 使用校园卡进行身份验证
docs.text: • 将校园卡在屏幕下方的感应区域轻轻刷过以进行身份验证。

docs.title: 步骤 3: 准备文件进行扫描
docs.text: • 打开打印机盖，将原始文件正面朝下放在玻璃板上，确保文件对齐刻度指示线。

docs.title: 步骤 4: 设置复印参数
docs.text: • 轻触复印机屏幕上的“复印”图标，开始设置复印参数。

docs.title: 步骤 5: 开始复印流程
docs.text: • 按下屏幕上的“开始”按钮，开始复印。

docs.title: 步骤 6: 取走文件
docs.text: • 复印结束后，记得取走你的原件和复印件。

docs.title: 步骤 7: 结束复印流程，刷卡并支付费用
Equipment Overview
docs.text:
• 电脑: 主要用于上传文件
  • 触摸屏:主要用于选择服务类型和刷卡扣费
  • 打印机: 主要用于打印和复印

docs.title: 引言
docs.text: 为了提供更加简单便捷的自助打印、复印等服务，东南大学图书馆与杭州优凡信息技术有限公司共同建立了图书馆自助服务系统。该系统现已正式上线，欢迎使用！

docs.title: 位置
docs.text: 在 九龙湖 校区，自助打印服务位于图书馆二楼的中心位置。 在 四牌楼 校区，打印中心位于图书馆一楼的100室。 在 丁家桥 校区，打印中心位于图书馆三楼的303室。

docs.title: 步骤 1: 传输文件
docs.text: • 登录微信，通过微信上传需要打印的文件。

docs.title: 步骤 2: 保存并打开文件
docs.text: • 登录微信，通过微信上传需要打印的文件。

docs.title: 步骤 3: 选择打印选项并设置打印要求
docs.text: • 在 Word 中选择打印选项，登录“联创打印管理系统”，输入校园卡号和密码，然后设置打印要求。

docs.title: 步骤 4: 刷卡并开始打印
docs.text: • 在终端选择“自助打印”，在感应区域刷卡并开始打印。

docs.title: 步骤 5: 取走文件并完成打印
docs.text:
Tip

  • 打印 PDF 文件或其他大型文件时，下载时间会更长，请耐心等待！
  • 请将 PDF 文件分段上传和打印，页数请不要超过 100 页！

docs.title: 常见问题及解决方案
docs.text:
6.1. 扣费但未打印纸张
  • 检查打印机是否缺纸。
  • 确认是否选择了正确的纸张大小。
6.2. 文件上传失败
  • 检查文件格式是否受支持，如不支持，请转换为支持的格式。
  • 检查文件大小是否超过打印机限制，如超过，请尝试上传或压缩文件。
6.3. 缺少墨水
  • 及时更换新的墨盒或碳粉盒。
  • 更换墨盒时，确保墨盒型号正确。
6.4. 卡纸
  • 当出现卡纸时，请按照打印机屏幕上的提示操作。

docs.title: 7.1. 保护个人隐私
docs.text:
• 确保在打印后及时取走打印的文档。
  • 打印完成后，请记得退出微信。

docs.title: 7.2. 遵守使用规定
docs.text: • 遵守版权法，不要打印侵权文档或盗版材料。

docs.title: 7.3. 注意设备维护
docs.text: • 使用前，请检查打印机是否正常工作。如有异常情况，请及时报修。
